key.name: window-height
key.description: Preserved height of the main window

key.name: window-width
key.description: Preserved width of the main window

key.name: window-top
key.description: Preserved top coordinate of the main window

key.name: window-left
key.description: Preserved left coordinate of the main window

key.name: prompt-toplevel
key.description: Bring the prompt window as front most and sticky on new prompt requests
